HTML.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a computer language used for producing pages of writing and pictures that can be put on the Internet
HTML.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: Hypertext Markup Language; a computer language for creating documents on the WORLD WIDE WEB, using a system of codes to design the document and create LINKs to other documents
HTML.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: You can convert Quark documents into HTML.
